And then, putting on his David Stockman cape, Colin Powell said: Don't tell me you're going to freeze to a level. That usually is a very inefficient way of doing it. Tell me what you're going to cut, and nobody up there yet is being very, very candid about what they are going to cut to fix this problem. Secretary Colin Powell is quite right that entitlement programs are where the real money is.
